name: Flee or Fry
description:
Flee or Fry

The cook is getting ready to make his favorite dish - chicken wings! You and your friend have little time to escape and hide! You must do it together, moving to the same directions and trying to get both of you inside your own hen house. Either both of you flee or both of you fry!

 Chicken boys

  Mauricio Scherer - Game Designer

  Douglas Brochado Machado - Programmer

  Gui Brendel - Programmer

  Marcos Brasil - Sound Designer

  Timoteo Thober - UI Designer
